se.nicklasgavelin.sphero
Class DriveAlgorithm

java.lang.Object
  se.nicklasgavelin.sphero.DriveAlgorithm
Direct Known Subclasses:
JoyStickDriveAlgorithm, RCDriveAlgorithm, TiltDriveAlgorithm
public abstract class DriveAlgorithm
extends java.lang.Object

Base abstract class for algorithms that are used to calculate heading, speed and any other necessary parameter for driving the Sphero robot directly using the Robot.drive method. Directly copied from Orbotix code

Author:
Orbotix
